body:
Comment 21: 
You just got unlucky in the time you chose to start contributing, at the end of a
release during stabilization time.

It's true the final fix was similar to yours, except the testing wasn't great.  The hook
for injecting failures makes it much faster and more reliable. There was also a
forgotten error check in the Walk code.

In any case, I should've given you credit in the latest round's commit message.
